game.name: Space Engineers
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Space Engineers is a sandbox engineering game where you design and build ships, stations, and planetary bases in a fully destructible environment. Explore planets and space, mine resources, survive hazards, and engage in combat alone or with friends in Creative or Survival modes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Space Engineers is a sandbox engineering game where you design and build ships, stations, and planetary bases in a fully destructible environment. Explore planets and space, mine resources, survive hazards, and engage in combat alone or with friends in Creative or Survival modes.

reviewHighlights.text: 솔직히 게임이 엄청 낡고 오래된 느낌이 들긴 하지만 광활한 우주에 나 혼자 뚝 떨어진 것 같은 고독함과 자가용 SCV 하나 만들어서 공중에 띄우고 조작할때 알 수 없는 뽕맛이 있는 게임임
